subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: With 1 minute 20 seconds left in an overtime that grew more tense by the shift, Scott Gomez beat Islanders goalie Rick DiPietro to give the Devils the victory.
snippet: With 1 minute 20 seconds left in an overtime that grew more tense by the shift, Scott Gomez beat Islanders goalie Rick DiPietro to give the Devils the victory.
